column1: #Text=Hou - Ting says : " No , to your left !

#Text=But , Your Majesty , the reason for our visit is that we 're trying to gather all of the new airbenders who are popping up in the Earth Kingdom , and we 'd like your help finding the ones in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " Airbenders in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Korra says : " Before we left Republic City we got some reports .
#Text=Well , before I even consider helping you , I 'll need you to do something for me .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " I have a vault full of tax money sitting in a town south of here .
#Text=Barbarians have stolen my past two shipments .
#Text=Go collect my money and bring it back here .
